allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: E-BrandID Artwork Downloader with Web Interface

Complete automation tool for downloading artwork files from e-brandid system:
- Web interface with split-screen layout \(20% sidebar, 80% main panel\)
- Express.js backend server with RESTful API
- Playwright-based automation for login and artwork extraction
- Batch processing support for multiple PO numbers
- Real-time progress tracking and detailed reporting
- Organized file structure with downloads by PO number

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
